channel.title: Caves

item.title: Caves
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

Hey Guys.
I’ve added everything for my fightcaves except for this

[code] public void process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
try {

if(respawnneeded == 1) {
server.fightcaves.waves(playerId);
}
if(fightmonster == 250) {
teleportToX = 2439;
teleportToY = 5169;
heightLevel = 0;
addItem(6570,1);
sendMessage(“You Have Successfully Completed The FightCaves!”);
fightmonster = 0;
}[/code]
where would i add it? and do i need the public void process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms try { part?
thanks

Read full topic
